data.title: Sample Underwriting Announcements
data.text:
Return to Corporate Support main menu

Script Guidelines

As a public radio station, DPM must follow FCC guidelines for recognizing corporate supporters on air. View the guidelines.

Sample Underwriting Scripts

Awareness

Support for DPM comes from J. Conn Scott in Selbyville and Rehoboth Beach … specializing in furniture and design for Delmarva interiors since 1924 … featuring Century, Hickory Chair, Lee and the Ralph Lauren home collection. Information at 302-436-8205, or at J Conn Scott dot com.

Support comes from Apple Electric. Whether adding a generator or a ceiling fan, wiring a home entertainment system, designing lighting for your family room or an entire commercial complex, Apple Electric has been providing service to Sussex County for twenty-five years. 302-645-5105 … also on Facebook.

Event Announcements

Support comes from the Rehoboth Art League, with their “Jewelry Trunk Show” on Saturday February 3rd, showcasing fine art jewelry from RAL member artists and Heidi Lowe, from ten o’clock to 4 o’clock ... all at the Art League’s historic Henlopen Acres campus. More information is online at Rehoboth Art League dot org.

Support comes from Coastal Hospice, hosting a day of family summer fun at Winterplace Park in Salisbury on Saturday, August 4th, from 11 am to 3 pm. Games, prizes, food and live music … all to benefit Kicks for Kids, the pediatric program of Coastal Hospice. Details at Coastal Hospice dot org slash kicks.

Products and Services

Support for Delmarva Public Media comes from the Wine Rack in Ocean City, specializing in fine wines, gourmet cheeses, gourmet desserts including Desserts by Rita, and domestic and imported beers. The Wine Rack is located on 85th Street and Coastal Highway in Ocean City. It is open daily, year ‘round.

Contact Our Corporate Support Staff:

Hannah Miller - Serving Maryland-based businesses
